title.en: There are - Plural, Negative & Questions (Hay plural, negativo y preguntas)
title.es: There are - Plural, Negative & Questions (Hay plural, negativo y preguntas)

description.en: Learn 'there are' for plural nouns, negative 'there aren't', and questions 'Are there...?'. Spanish speakers often miss the singular/plural distinction in 'hay', but English requires different forms for different quantities.
description.es: Aprende 'there are' para sustantivos en plural, negativo 'there aren't', y preguntas 'Are there...?'. Los hispanohablantes a menudo pierden la distinción singular/plural en 'hay', pero el inglés requiere formas diferentes para diferentes cantidades.

prompt.es: Hay cientos de moscas volando por el aire.

exercises.solution: There are hundreds of flies flying about.

tip.en: Use 'there are' for plural countable nouns.
tip.es: Usa 'there are' para sustantivos contables en plural.

prompt.es: Hay miles de personas esperando tu respuesta.

exercises.solution: There are thousands of people waiting for your answer.

tip.en: Use 'there are' for plural countable nouns.
tip.es: Usa 'there are' para sustantivos contables en plural.

prompt.es: ¡Hay millones de personas leyendo esta página ahora mismo!

exercises.solution: There are millions of people reading this page right now!

tip.en: Use 'there are' for plural countable nouns.
tip.es: Usa 'there are' para sustantivos contables en plural.

prompt.es: No hay pasos de cebra en mi calle.

exercises.solution: There aren't any zebra crossings on my street.

tip.en: Use 'there aren't' for negative plural. No contraction for positive.
tip.es: Usa 'there aren't' para plural negativo. No hay contracción para positivo.

prompt.es: No hay soluciones indoloras para aprender inglés.

exercises.solution: How many left-handed people are there in your neighbourhood?

tip.en: Invert 'there' and 'are' to form questions: 'Are there...?'
tip.es: Invierte 'there' y 'are' para formar preguntas: 'Are there...?'
